welcome.title: Welcome to your CV workspace!
welcome.description: We'll guide you through the different sections to create a professional CV. You can skip this tutorial at any time or restart it from the help button.

navbar.title: Main navigation
navbar.description: Use this navigation bar to access different application features.

cvNavigation.title: CV Navigation
cvNavigation.description: Navigate between different CV sections to organize your information.

progress.title: Track your progress
progress.description: This bar shows your advancement. Each completed section increases your percentage. Aim for 100% for a complete CV!

import.title: Import your existing CV
import.description: Already have a CV? Use this feature to automatically analyze it and pre-fill your information. Supports PDF and Word files.

sidebar.title: Section navigation
sidebar.description: Navigate between different CV sections. Green dots indicate completed sections. Click on a section to access it directly.

personalInfo.title: Start with your information
personalInfo.description: First fill in your personal information: name, email, phone, etc. This is the foundation of your CV. You can also add a professional photo.

navigation.title: Navigate between sections
navigation.description: Use these buttons to move from one section to another. The 'Next' button is only enabled when the current section is completed. At the end, you'll be able to choose a design!

tabbar.title: Mobile navigation
tabbar.description: On mobile, use this bar to quickly navigate between sections.

hero.title: Your intelligent professional guide

student.name: Engineering Student Profile
student.description: Recent engineering graduate with a strong academic foundation in software development and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Java, and C++. Completed multiple real-world projects including a predictive analytics system that improved efficiency by 25%. Seeking a challenging role where I can apply my technical skills and innovative mindset to develop cutting-edge solutions.

archivist.name: Professional Archivist Profile
archivist.description: Detail-oriented archivist with 8 years of experience in document management and preservation. Expert in developing efficient cataloging systems and implementing digital archiving solutions. Advanced knowledge of industry-standard software and metadata frameworks. Strong track record of improving accessibility while maintaining strict compliance with confidentiality regulations.

beginner.name: Versatile Professional Profile
beginner.description: Motivated professional with a diverse skill set spanning project management, customer service, and data analysis. Fast learner who adapts quickly to new environments and technologies. Excellent communication skills with a proven ability to collaborate across departments. Dedicated to delivering high-quality results and contributing positively to team objectives.

meta.application_description: AI Assistant for CV creation and career development
meta.author: Guidy

faq.how_it_works_fr: Comment fonctionne le créateur de CV IA de Guidy?
faq.how_it_works_answer_fr: Guidy utilise l'IA avancée pour analyser votre expérience professionnelle et créer des CV adaptés à votre région et secteur cibles. Saisissez simplement vos informations, sélectionnez vos préférences, et notre IA génère des CV professionnels compatibles ATS en quelques minutes. Nos templates sont optimisés pour maximiser votre taux de réponse.
faq.how_it_works_en: How does Guidy's AI resume builder work?
faq.how_it_works_answer_en: Guidy uses advanced AI to analyze your professional experience and create tailored resumes optimized for your target region and industry. Simply input your details, select your preferences, and our AI generates professional, ATS-friendly resumes in minutes. Our templates are optimized to maximize your response rate from recruiters.
faq.availability_fr: Est-ce que Guidy est disponible dans mon pays?
faq.availability_answer_fr: Oui! Guidy est disponible dans le monde entier avec des optimisations spécifiques pour l'Amérique du Nord, l'Europe, l'Afrique et les marchés anglophones mondiaux. Notre plateforme prend en charge l'anglais et le français avec des modèles adaptés à chaque région, respectant les normes locales de recrutement.
faq.availability_en: Is Guidy available in my country?
faq.availability_answer_en: Yes! Guidy is available worldwide with specific optimizations for North America, Europe, Africa, and global English-speaking markets. Our platform supports English and French languages with region-specific templates that follow local recruitment standards and employer expectations.
faq.free_answer_fr: Oui, Guidy propose une version gratuite qui vous permet de créer des CV professionnels et d'accéder aux fonctionnalités de base. Vous pouvez créer autant de CV que vous souhaitez, les télécharger en PDF et accéder à nos conseils de base sans frais. Des options premium sont disponibles pour des fonctionnalités avancées.
faq.free_answer_en: Yes, Guidy offers a free version that allows you to create professional resumes and access basic features. You can create as many resumes as you want, download them as PDFs, and access our basic career advice at no cost. Premium options are available for advanced features and personalized guidance.
faq.ats_optimized_fr: Les CV créés avec Guidy sont-ils optimisés pour les ATS?
faq.ats_optimized_answer_fr: Absolument! Tous nos modèles de CV sont conçus pour être parfaitement compatibles avec les systèmes ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) utilisés par les recruteurs. Notre IA analyse les offres d'emploi pour suggérer les mots-clés pertinents à inclure dans votre CV, augmentant ainsi vos chances de passer les filtres automatiques.
faq.ats_optimized_en: Are Guidy's resumes optimized for ATS?
faq.ats_optimized_answer_en: Absolutely! All our resume templates are designed to be perfectly compatible with ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) used by recruiters. Our AI analyzes job postings to suggest relevant keywords to include in your resume, increasing your chances of passing automatic filters.
